thread.title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Results

title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Results
text: April 17, 2018 / 6:55 PM / Updated an hour ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Apr 17 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles matches on Tuesday .. 1st Round .. Gilles Simon (FRA) beat 16-Adrian Mannarino (FRA) 6-3 4-6 6-2 Philipp Kohlschreiber beat Tennys Sandgren (USA) 6-2 6-2 (GER) Feliciano Lopez (ESP) beat Benoit Paire (FRA) 5-7 7-6(5) 6-4 Richard Gasquet (FRA) beat Jeremy Chardy (FRA) 6-4 7-6(5) 10-Diego Schwartzman (ARG) beat Guido Pella (ARG) 0-6 6-2 6-3 13-Fabio Fognini (ITA) beat Ilya Ivashka (BLR) 6-4 7-5 Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) beat Yuichi Sugita (JPN) 6-3 6-2 Andreas Seppi (ITA) beat Kyle Edmund (GBR) 6-3 5-7 6-2 Marco Cecchinato (ITA) beat Damir Dzumhur (BIH) 6-3 6-2 Fernando Verdasco (ESP) beat Pablo Cuevas (URU) 5-7 7-6(4) 6-1 .. 2nd Round .. 5-Dominic Thiem (AUT) beat Andrey Rublev (RUS) 5-7 7-5 7-5 4-Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) beat   3-6 6-2 6-4 (FRA) 6-David Goffin (BEL) beat Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) 7-6(4) 7-5 Mischa Zverev (GER) beat 7-Lucas Pouille (FRA) 2-6 6-1 7-6(3) 3-Alexander Zverev (GER) beat Gilles Muller (LUX) 4-6 6-3 6-2
